pr_title: Removed root directory methods, added javadoc

timeline.message: made getRootDirClient private, and added some javadoc

timeline.bodyText: Do you have tests about getRootDirectoryClient, do you need to edit them?
timeline.author: xiafu-msft

replies.bodyText: Our tests are in Groovy and it lets you test private methods too - so it shouldnt break them!
replies.author: gapra-msft
